alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Interstate 5 Corridor; Malibu Coast; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 1:58PM PST until December 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
